Lyric:
[by:工作婊]
[00:08.33]I’d stroll into a bank and put a ski mask on
[00:10.50]And walk out with a million bucks
[00:12.48]Then I’d burn it in a pile out on your front lawn
[00:14.81]Just to prove it didn’t mean that much
[00:16.73]I’d sell everything I own, take a pile of cash
[00:19.06]Walk into the casino, blow it all on black
[00:21.20]Then blow all of my winnings on a limousine
[00:23.41]To make out with you in the back, hey
[00:26.70]I’m not afraid to look insane
[00:30.86]Cause I’m crazy about you
[00:33.40]There’s nothing that I won’t do
[00:37.70]Just to make you love me, love me, love me
[00:41.91]Throw away my pride for you
[00:46.16]Just to make you love me, want me, trust me
[00:50.39]Baby, I know I’m not ashamed
[00:53.19]Just need you and I could care less
[00:55.67]If everyone knows I’m your fool
[00:59.14]Girl there’s nothing that I won’t do
[01:03.39]Just to make you love me, love me, love me
[01:08.31]I’d buy a couple red-eye one-way tickets to Paris doing first class rate
[01:12.56]Then I’d carry your body to the top of the tower to kiss your lips at midnight
[01:16.78]Then we’ll wander through the streets, and drink champagne
[01:19.10]Get drunk and start singing in the pouring rain
[01:21.14]I’ll acapella karaoke “Sexy Thing”, cause baby I feel no shame
[01:25.25]Say this whole world can know you’re all I need
[01:29.32]Cause baby some day I’ll drop and hit one knee and tell you
[01:35.26]I’m not afraid to change your name
[01:39.45]Cause I’m crazy about you
[01:42.00]There’s nothing that I won’t do
[01:46.21]Just to make you love me, love me, love me
[01:50.53]Throw away my pride for you
[01:54.77]Just to make you love me, want me, trust me
[01:59.07]Baby, I know I’m not ashamed
[02:01.81]Just need you and I could care less
[02:04.33]If everyone knows I’m your fool
[02:07.67]Girl there’s nothing that I won’t do
[02:11.86]Just to make you love me, love me, love me
[02:16.48]Hey, ah-ah-ah-ah
[02:21.44]Throw myself out of every jet plane
[02:23.66]Hundred feet a second just screaming your name
[02:25.55]Ah-ah-ah-ah
[02:29.88]I see the cop car turn blue lights on
[02:32.25]Pick you up driving around ‘til dawn
[02:35.22]I’m not afraid to look insane
[02:39.56]Cause I’m crazy about you
[02:42.29]Oh, oh, oh I’m not afraid to look insane
[02:48.00]Cause I’m crazy, crazy, crazy
[02:50.61]There’s nothing that I won’t do
[02:54.77]Just to make you love me, love me, love me
[02:59.12]Throw away my pride for you
[03:03.34]Just to make you love me, want me, trust me
[03:07.64]Baby, I know I’m not ashamed
[03:10.33]Just need you and I could care less
[03:12.85]If everyone knows I’m your fool
[03:16.28]Girl there’s nothing that I won’t do
[03:20.44]Just to make you love me, love me, love me
[03:24.75]Baby�
